modName: Sakura the East Asian Beauty Follower
summary:
This is Standalone follower mod.You don't need other Mods.
Sakura is the immigrants who came from distant provinces to Skyrim.
You will meet with her in the grounds of the University of Solitude.
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://lh6.googleusercontent.com/-sKP0stxkngo/VLL52Ym-23I/AAAAAAAAAm0/ON-zlxq1NNU/w800-h450-no/Screenshot13591809813.jpg[/img]

[color=#e06666][size=5]Sakura the East Asian Follower[/size][/color]

Thank you for visiting! This is the first time to post a Mod on Nexus.
Please forgive my poor English.

I wanted to make a contemporary East Asian beauty followers, such as see on TV today.
This mod is BETA yet.It becomes official version if there is no problem.
If there is something bug, please tell me.
[b]
Please feel free to upload screen and video.I might be linked them here if you allow.[/b]

[color=#f4cccc][size=4]About Sakura[/size][/color]

Sakura is the immigrants who came from distant provinces to Skyrim.
You will meet with her in the grounds of the University of Solitude.
She is good at archery, but there is also a little timid surface.But she's Essential.
You can get married with her if you want.



[color=#f9cb9c]------Please ignore if you can not understand or you do not need.[/color][color=#f9cb9c]--------[/color]
Body is UNPB-BBP Weight 0.00

and MAINFAIL have a Weight 100.00 Headmesh named "00000D69fat.nif"  in "Data\meshes\actors\character\FaceGenData\FaceGeom\SakuraFollower.esp". Please rename it if necessary.

Weighted Body is not included.Please replace.and edit esp to change actor weight.
[color=#f9cb9c]---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]

[color=#f4cccc][size=4]Requirements[/size][/color]

Skyrim version 1.9.32
SKSE version 1.6.16 or higher


[color=#f4cccc][size=4]Recommended[/size][/color]

Follower overhaul mod such as FLP
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35303/?]Female Facial Animation[/url] by nao4288 [b]Highly recommend[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30533/?]Face to face conversation[/url] by towawot

[img]https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-R0hrqy92XgA/VLL52YO6BGI/AAAAAAAAAmw/7OJh2IS83wU/w800-h450-no/Screenshot13591811814.jpg[/img]
